channel.title: Pk Till Death - Need Mods!
channel.description:
[center][s]Well, basically I have a great server/client that I would like to put online. Problem is I need VPS or just a basic hoster. The Hoster gets free Donator, Co-Owner and will also recive 50% of donations![/s] We got one! [center] Other Positions:
[s][img]http://i674.photobucket.com/albums/vv102/GFXlova/Icons/Crowns/admin.gif[/img]Head Admin (1/1)[img]http://i674.photobucket.com/albums/vv102/GFXlova/Icons/Crowns/admin.gif[/img] [img]http://i674.photobucket.com/albums/vv102/GFXlova/Icons/Crowns/admin.gif[/img]Hidden Admin (1/1)[img]http://i674.photobucket.com/albums/vv102/GFXlova/Icons/Crowns/admin.gif[/img] [img]http://i674.photobucket.com/albums/vv102/GFXlova/Icons/Crowns/admin.gif[/img]Admin (2/2)[img]http://i674.photobucket.com/albums/vv102/GFXlova/Icons/Crowns/admin.gif[/img][/s] [img]http://i926.photobucket.com/albums/ad108/scarboy3000/ModCrown.png[/img]Head Moderator (1/1)[img]http://i926.photobucket.com/albums/ad108/scarboy3000/ModCrown.png[/img] [img]http://i926.photobucket.com/albums/ad108/scarboy3000/ModCrown.png[/img]Moderator (0/4)[img]http://i926.photobucket.com/albums/ad108/scarboy3000/ModCrown.png[/img] [/center]
Info: 525 Pretty well coded Hellscape as base Already has curses and is fully working!
In order to get any please fill out the format below:
Can you host a server at least 8 hours a day? What position do you aim for? Why do you think you derserve this position? What is you maturity level (out of 10)? Are you good at coding?

item.description:
@Runes_Are_Cool wrote:

Can you host a server at least 8 hours a day? I won’t be hosting.
What position do you aim for? Head Admin. Pretty much any staff spot, but, I’m more interested in coding the server.
Why do you think you derserve this position? Responsible, Mature, Not an little 5 year old.
What is you maturity level (out of 10)? 10
Are you good at coding? Yes, I am fluent when it comes to programming.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Till Death - Need Mods!
item.dc:creator: @123blademan1 123blademan1
item.description:
@123blademan1 wrote:

[quote=“PkerzOwnerofPKTillDeath, post:1, topic:392278”][center]Well, basically I have a great server/client that I would like to put online. Problem is I need VPS or just a basic hoster. The Hoster gets free Donator, Co-Owner and will also recive 50% of donations!
[center]
Other Positions:

Head Admin (0/1)
Hidden Admin (0/1)
Admin (0/2)
Head Moderator (0/1)
Hidden Moderator (0/1)
Moderator (0/4)
[/center]

Info:
525
Pretty well coded
Hellscape as base
Already has curses and is fully working!

In order to get any please fill out the format below:

Can you host a server at least 8 hours a day?
What position do you aim for?
Why do you think you derserve this position?
What is you maturity level (out of 10)?
Are you good at coding?

[/center][/quote]

Can you host a server at least 8 hours a day? 24/7, dedicated, 100% uptime, 8GB RAM 8000GB Bandwidth… of course I can.
What position do you aim for? Head admin.
Why do you think you derserve this position? Because I spend over $500 on hosting a year, I basically outlaw anyone’s hosting.
What is you maturity level (out of 10)? 10 (I’m 22)
Are you good at coding? Yes, I am somewhat an expert, and I know alot of C

Read full topic
